name: ParkFountain
0:
”Alexa open Park Fountain”
”Alexa ask Park Fountain to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: park fountain
des:
Park Fountain recreates the tranquil sound of water flowing in a fountain, this skill aims to transport you to a serene park setting. The continuous flow of water is not only soothing but also helps in masking unwanted background noise, creating a peaceful atmosphere for relaxation or concentration.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Park Fountain
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
